title: Parameters for FileOutputHandler
description: A FileOutputHandler stores the data in memory and writes it to the given file when finalizing

is-FileOutputHandler.description: A key value to flag that this describes a FileOutputHandler

filename.description: file name where to save the data, can be an interpolated string

header.description: True if the file needs to start with a header with column names

maxlines.description: Hint for the maximum number of lines.  Can be exceeded, at the cost of a reallocation.

variable-names.description: list of names of output expressions to output
